articles.content: Bruce Haffty, MD, MS, chair, Radiation Oncology, associate vice chancellor for Cancer Programs, Rutgers Cancer Institute of New Jersey, system director, Radiation Oncology, RWJBarnabas Health, discus… [+2215 chars]
